concept.title: Understanding Sound: Basic Principles
concept.shortdesc: Sound is a form of energy that travels through media as mechanical waves.

section.title: What is Sound?
section.p: Sound is a mechanical wave that results from the back and forth vibration of the particles of the medium through which the sound wave is moving. Most commonly, this medium is air, though sound can travel through any material medium.

ul.li: Vibration: The source of all sound is a vibrating object
Medium: The material through which sound travels
Wave Motion: The transfer of energy through the medium
Reception: The detection and interpretation of sound waves
